projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.description: Calculate your exact age in years, months, and days with this intuitive age calculator. Features include date validation, leap year handling, and detailed age breakdown.

projects.title: Background Generator
projects.description: Create stunning gradient backgrounds with this interactive generator. Choose colors, adjust angles, and export CSS code for your projects.

projects.title: Contact Form
projects.description: Professional contact form with validation, email integration, and responsive design. Includes form validation, error handling, and success notifications.

projects.title: Battery Indicator
projects.description: Visual battery level indicator with charging animation. Features dynamic color changes, percentage display, and smooth charging effects.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: Full-featured calculator with basic arithmetic operations, memory functions, and keyboard support. Clean interface with error handling.

projects.title: Cat Generator
projects.description: Generate adorable random cat images with this fun application. Features different cat breeds, image caching, and social sharing capabilities.

projects.title: Color Guessing Game
projects.description: Test your color recognition skills with this interactive guessing game. Features RGB challenges, scoring system, and difficulty levels.

projects.title: Custom Slider
projects.description: Customizable range slider component with multiple handles, step controls, and value formatting. Perfect for filtering and data input.

projects.title: Digital Clock
projects.description: Modern digital clock with multiple time zones, alarm functionality, and customizable display formats. Features 12/24 hour modes.

projects.title: BMI Calculator
projects.description: Calculate Body Mass Index with health recommendations. Supports metric and imperial units with detailed health category explanations.

projects.title: Expand Button
projects.description: Interactive expandable button component with smooth animations. Features customizable content areas and transition effects.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.description: Full-featured blog platform with post creation, editing, and commenting system. Includes user authentication and rich text editor.

projects.title: Count Down Timer
projects.description: Versatile countdown timer with custom duration settings, visual progress indicators, and notification alerts when time expires.

projects.title: Compound Interest Calculator
projects.description: Calculate compound interest with detailed breakdown of principal, interest, and total amount. Features multiple compounding frequencies and investment planning tools.

projects.title: Film Finder
projects.description: Discover movies and TV shows with advanced search filters. Features ratings, reviews, trailers, and personalized recommendations based on preferences.

projects.title: FAQ Accordion
projects.description: Interactive FAQ section with smooth accordion animations. Features search functionality, categorized questions, and expandable content areas.

projects.description: Generate secure passwords with customizable options
